txt.en: 'Good work. May they trouble none again.'
Gurthern has asked you to reduce the number of elhudan in Tyrn Gorthad.\n\nTyrn Gorthad is located in north-western Cardolan.
Tyrn Gorthad is haunted by elhudan, wisps that seem to enjoy luring away children and leading travellers astray.

'I encourage you to do what you can to reduce the numbers of these luring glooms, [placeholder]. Let no more children be led astray.\n\n'Be careful, though, [placeholder]. Do not follow the elhudan too closely, as they love to lure folk into swamps, pits, and deadly pools.'
You should let Gurthern know that you have defeated many luring glooms.\n\nGurthern is in Tyrn Gorthad in north-western Cardolan.
